text: The maximum height of any building in a Residential Zone must not exceed 7.5 metres, except for chimneys and antennae.
source: Nelson City Council District Plan - Section 8.3.2

text: All buildings must be set back at least 3 metres from any road boundary and 1.5 metres from side or rear boundaries.
source: Nelson City Council District Plan - Section 8.3.3

text: The total area of buildings on any site must not exceed 40 percent of the total site area.
source: Nelson City Council District Plan - Section 8.3.4

text: Buildings in the Commercial Zone may be built up to 12 metres in height, provided sunlight access to adjoining Residential properties is not compromised.
source: Nelson City Council District Plan - Section 9.2.1

text: There is no minimum setback requirement in the Commercial Zone unless the site adjoins a Residential Zone, in which case a 3-metre setback applies.
source: Nelson City Council District Plan - Section 9.2.2
